snippet.title: Squarelets Trailer
snippet.description:
Squarelets: cosy design, easy to get, engaging for hours. An image puzzle game to play when you need a refuge from the overstimulation of the modern world. Immerse yourself in a world of vivid colours, charming graphics, and satisfying gameplay.

Squarelets uses a custom AI algorithm to generate the images in each round, so you’ll never get the same puzzle twice!

You can also compete with friends to get to the top of the leaderboard. Add all the badges to unlock, and you get a captivatingly cute game to play when you need a little break from the world!

Available on TestFlight now: https://www.chaoscookie.games/squarelets
